name: Bob's Adventure (Eonmobil)
description:
It is hardcore fast precession based jumping  platformer  game.  

Keys

  • Left Mouse -> Jump
  • Double click Left Mouse  -> Double Jump
  • Space Bar -> Hold

Features

  • Handcrafted 21 Levels 
  • Connected multiple worlds
  • Precise controls

How To Install

  • Unzip file and play

Game Play Snippets

Hope you enjoy our game . Cheers!!
